sense.name: An instance or action of being incorrect.
sense.examples: He made a grave error. She was quick to point out my errors. The book was full of errors. He made an error an lost her trust.

sense.name: (baseball) a failure of a defensive player to make an out when normal play would have sufficed.
sense.examples: The fielder made two errors that game.

sense.name: (computer science) the occurence of an incorrect result produced by a computer.
sense.examples: The program demonstrated many errors. Errors occurred as the program compiled.
